rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 7 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 11:00 AM, 12 June 2025(Thursday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Zambales.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, expect light to moderate rains over Metro Manila, Cavite, Nueva Ecija, Rizal, Batangas, Laguna and Quezon within the next 3 hours.

Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Bataan, Tarlac, Pampanga and Bulacan which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 2:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
